title: 618. 10 Takeaways from Week 12
itunes:title: 618. 10 Takeaways from Week 12
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and pick ten storylines that stood out from Week 12 of the NFL season. To start off, the guys discuss the Browns grinding out a win against the Jaguars (1:02). Next, the trio look at how the 49ers muddied the NFC West by defeating the Rams and then do a further discussion comparing Rams QB Jared Goff and Eagles QB Carson Wentz (5:39). Later, the guys look at how the Giants are a playoff team as of right now (20:05). Then, they pick college coaches who could have an impact like Panthers head coach Matt Rhule on a NFL team (35:08). To wrap up the show, DJ, Bucky and Rhett talk about the Falcons blowout victory over the Raiders (44:18). All that and more in this packed episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
